mapper.select: select count(*) from inquiry_comment where inquiry_idx = #{inquiry_idx}
select * from ( select ic.*, r.user_id from inquiry_comment ic join regular_user r on ic.writer = r.idx ) as icData where inquiry_idx = #{inquiry_idx} order by i_comment_idx asc
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO inquiry_comment (inquiry_idx, writer, content, register_date) VALUES (#{inquiry_idx}, #{writer}, #{content}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
